channel.title: New to coding! Looking to Start a Team to improve on coding!
channel.description:
Hey Whats up Moparscape! Mattredd9395 here,
I am looking to get into coding rsps but i don't know where to start of with a base like delta,
pi, Hyperion, all star or any other bases. I am new to coding but i would love to learn by
starting a development team with anyone who like to learn as well or experience coders who
will like to help build a rsps remake or just a regular rsps. i do apologize in advance if this is a
nub thread to learn but i don't know where to start to be honest. if anyone is interested in
learning and meeting new people to code and make a better rsps it would be great appreciatively :)
Contact me Here
Skype: Mattredd9395
Thanks for your time :)

item.title: New to coding! Looking to Start a Team to improve on coding!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:10, topic:536734”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=655549.msg4403776#msg4403776 date=1391280066]
You will only learn bad habits if you learn from rsps …
[/quote]They will learn the basics then further reading can easily fix up their knowledge. Just because they are going to learn by example from RSPS doesn’t mean they will learn terrible concepts, have you heard of Hyperion or RuneSource?[/quote]I’m sure it’s possible no doubt look at imsuperman05 ( even though he even admits he has some flaws/bad habits now because of it ) I would still suggest they get the basics at least down put from java docs

even though I do have to admit I learned about enums from rsps fairly easily

Read full topic
item.source: New to coding! Looking to Start a Team to improve on coding!
